name: HommeFace Men’s Daily Trio 3-Step Daily Routine Set with Face Wash, Herbal Spray Toner & Moisturizer - Korean Skincare Technology with CICA, Tea Tree Leaf & Witch Hazel Extracts, for All Skin Types
short_description: THE 3-STEP DAILY ROUTINE FOR MEN - Get ready to seize the day with a skincare essentials kit that’s designed for men of all skin types and tones. The set includes 3 full size products: Daily Face Wash, Herbal Spray Toner, and Face Moisturizer.

HIGHLIGHTS - Generous in volume with a larger capacity for lasting use. Non stripping with a plant-derived surfactant that softly foams to gently cleanse the skin. Rehydrates and restores moisture loss from cleansing and shaving, providing long-lasting hydration with a lightweight, non-greasy finish.
HYALURONIC ACID & COLLAGEN - Smoothes the appearance of wrinkles, improves the skin’s texture, locks in moisture for long-lasting hydration, and reduces flaking.

PLANT-POWERED SKIN CARE - Infused with Centella Asiatica, Tea Tree Leaf, Witch Hazel + more to nourish the skin with a potent blend of antioxidants and vitamins that remove excess oil, and help reduce acne.

CLEAN & EFFECTIVE FORMULA - We develop safe and effective hair, body, and skin solutions that are easy to use, expertly formulated with high-impact ingredients, and nourishing active botanicals. HF products are cruelty-free, vegan, and made without parabens, sulfates, and drying alcohols.

name: Gifts for Men, Mens Anti-Aging Skin Care Kit - Retinol & Hyaluronic Acid Facial Care Set for Wrinkle Reduction, Deep Hydration & Firming | All Skin Types | Daily Routine for Men
short_description: ENHANCE YOUR ATTRACTION - This mens skincare set is designed for men of all ages to help them regain their good looks. The Men's Facial Care Set includes Face Wash (3.4oz), Scrub (2oz), Eye Cream (0.7oz), Face Cream (1oz), Serum (1.7oz). The skincare set can be used as your starter set or as a gift for someone else.

YOUNGER SKIN - The eye cream, face cream and serum in this kit will keep your skin hydrated all day long, helping to erase dark circles, fine lines and wrinkles and restore your skin's radiance. The facial wash and scrub rinses away oil and dirt, exfoliates and controls oil production gently and long lastingly, leaving your skin clean without feeling tight.

PREMIUM QUALITY INGREDIENTS - A mens skin care kit that targets anti-aging, fine lines and wrinkles. Men's self-care kit contains sodium hyaluronate, niacinamide, retinol, botanical extracts, etc. It cleanses, exfoliates, calms the skin, restores the skin's protective barrier, makes the skin radiant and elastic, and slows down the rate of skin aging.

ONE SET FIXES ALL - This mes skin care kit will fulfill your needs and make skincare easy and effective. Our products will nourish your skin, leaving it clean, healthy and handsome. It is safe for sensitive skin and is free of dyes, parabens and phthalates. It makes skin care easy, fast and effective!

GIFT BOX PACKAGING - Men's Facial Care Set for all skin types. Skin care products are perfect for Valentine's Day gifts, Father's Day gifts, birthday gifts, anniversary gifts, Christmas gifts for fathers, boyfriends, husbands, brothers, boys! Make them more confident and handsome!
